text: Bamir Myrteza Topi (born 24 April 1957 in Tirana)CV at Albanian presidency website. is an Albanian diplomat and politician. He served as President of Albania from 2007 to 2012. == References == Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:European diplomats Category:Politicians from Tirana Category:Presidents of Albania Category:Veterinarians
title: Bamir Topi
